content.question: Which of the following does NOT exert a major influence on Earth’s overall climate?

choices.label: The annual amount of solar radiation that reaches Earth’s surface
The concentrations of the specific gases in Earth’s atmosphere
The distribution of land masses and oceans, in combination with Earth’s topography
The daily rotation of Earth on its axis, and its annual revolution around the Sun
The seasonal development of temperature inversions in geographical basins

content.answer: The seasonal development of temperature inversions in geographical basins

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
